fun puzzles, funny story, funnier child abandonment
Very fun game, high replay value with the multiplayer maps. Super cool really recommend this.
Ich kann das Spiel nicht starten!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

This is by far one of my favourite games, after playing portal 1 i wanted to play portal 2 and this game far exceeded my expectations, there are so many reasons to love this game from the comedy to the characters as well as the story, all in all definitely recommend.
The new gel puzzles are not as fun as I would like them to be but still a worthy part 2
Pretty fun and the puzzles are much harder than the first Portal. I almost quit when the three damned turrets showed up tho. I recommend it.
A damn good game to revisit once you've forgotten the puzzles. With a heartfelt story too, oddly.

If you have $10 to spend, please get this game. I'm not gonna spoil it as you need to play this yourself but it is full of amazing puzzles and this one blows the first one out of the water (Portal 1 is also amazing but this one is way better). The fact that this game was made with the Source Engine baffles me, it is so high quality even 10 years later. This game is worth way more than $10, this is an absolute must play for anyone even if you don't like puzzle games, this game is a masterpiece. Also the Co-Op is literally the most fun you can have with a friend in a video game.
I would most likely recommend to other people since its an amazing game with many puzzles and with many physics puzzles being in the game.
esta en mi top 5 de mejores juegos :D

When unique gameplay is combined with compelling story telling and tonnes of sarcasm, an instant classic is born. This was true for Portal 1, but Portal 2 amps it to 11. Recommended for everyone to try at least once.
I love this game, it is a good sequel to half life 2 and splitgate. pretty good
So much fun for just $2, really well spent just only playing for 4 hours so far.

I was going to buy Battlefield 2042 on this Saturday evening, but thought nah, let's play something that's actually good. This game is honestly good. Until now, I only heard of it and knew the general idea of having portals, but I didn't know that it's so much fun to solve the puzzles. My absolute kicker however was the small robot Wheatley because it had so much humor. The voice and jokes were just perfect. I wished the big game studios would put that much love into their games.
me lo fundi en unas horas, recomendado

What a brilliant game it is superb in every aspect and at its current discount of 80% off you would be a fool to pass up the opportunity to experience possibly the best pc game in existence in any universe !
this game is one of the best ever!!1

Great game 
Story 10/10 
Gameplay 10/10
Challenging 10/10
J.K. Simmons 10/10

Where do I even start.
One of, if not, THE best game i have ever played in my life.
Although, this game focuses more on story than just puzzles but that does NOT mean that it lacks in the puzzle area AT ALL.
This game and its predecessor are definitely in my top 5. This game improves on the first by including a multiplayer, upgrading the engine, and a longer and more content-filled story mode.

This game is very good, and I would definitely get this ESPECIALLY during the steam awards/autumn sale or the summer sale, where you can get the Portal bundle (Portal 1 and 2) for like $4.90AUD.

Another big thing about the game is the spinoff/mod/fan games. Things like Portal Reloaded, Portal Stories: Mel, Aperture Tag and more, the amount of effort put into these games is insane, and most of them match the quality of a valve-made game. 

Overall: 10/10 game. But it.

Creative and genius puzzles, with many game mechanics to learn. A rich and compelling lore and story, with some humor thrown in. Hours of entertainment.
